Title: AXA Mansard records strong earnings amid risks from naira volatility
Summary: AXA Mansard Insurance Plc has emerged as one of Nigeria’s most resilient insurance players in 2024 . In a year shaped by economic turbulence, currency devaluations, and financial market uncertainties, the insurance company has emerged .

Title: Female YouTubers redefining creativity, shaping global narratives
Summary: Nigerian YouTube creators solidified their position on the global stage last year . Over 100 Nigerian channels now boast more than one million subscribers . Over 70 percent of their watch time originated from international audiences .

Title: The controversy over Tinubu’s 5th travel to France
Summary: The public outpouring generated by President Bola Tinubu’s last visit to France would have been needless and perhaps avoidable . The president correctly communicated what the travel was all about to Nigerians .

Summary: Today is yet another World Press Freedom Day 2025 . The organic theme for this year is ‘Time to put AI on the social agenda’ The International Federation of Journalists (IFJ), the global voice for journalists .

Title: In City Dwellers, Uchay Joel Chima interrogates social realities
Summary: Uchay Joel Chima is known for his exploration of memories, imaginations, societal happenings and emotions . His latest show, City Dwellers, is a solo show featuring recent mixed-media works .

Title: Study links fatal heart diseases to common household plastics
Summary: Daily exposure to certain chemicals called phthalates, used to make plastic household items, has been linked to hundreds of thousands of global deaths . Phthalates are used in the production of plastic household products .

Summary: A Lagos-based fashion designer, Nofisat Jamiu, has recounted how a gas explosion claimed the lives of four members of her family at a retail shop where her mother worked as a sales attendant . Title: I was stopped from saving ex-Customs officer who died during  wife’s birthday – Medical doctor
Summary: Dr Rasheed Olaniyi, a bosom friend of over four decades to the late Kunle Akinyele, who slumped and died during his wife’s 60th birthday celebration, tells GRACE EDEMA how he could have saved him, among other related issues .

Title: K1 is head of Ijebu princes not king of fuji — Kollington
Summary: Veteran fuji musician, Ayinla Kollington, has said that he is the king of fuji without any rival . He stated this while appearing for an interview on Agbaletu TV . Speaking on why he didn’t attend or contribute to the burial of the mother of another iconic fuji singer, Wasiu

Title: We don't cancel flights for fun, Air Peace replies NCAA
Summary: Nigeria's Air Peace has said it will cancel and delay more flights due to safety concerns if the need arises . The airline also said its business priority isn’t profit but safety, though it has more aircraft than the authority schedules daily . The Nigeria Civil Aviation Authority had earlier on Friday complained about incessant flight disruptions by the airline .
